# Resolve alert priority conflicts

Objective:

- Practice prioritizing alerts when multiple signals fire simultaneously.
- Learn to distinguish urgency from noise.
- Develop judgment under competing operational signals.

---
Requirements:

- A set of alerts from the same system and time window is provided.
- Alerts include different severities and domains.
- The task must be completed fully offline.

---
Task Requirements:

- Review all provided alerts.
- Identify which alert(s) require immediate attention.
- Explain why other alerts are lower priority.
- Record your reasoning in **priority-assessment.md**.

---
Constraints:

- Do NOT run commands or scripts.
- Do NOT modify the alert data.
- Do NOT assume user impact unless evidence supports it.
- Do NOT attempt root cause analysis.
- Focus on prioritization and reasoning.
